articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: A single default password exposes access to dozens of apartment buildings - TechCrunch
articles.description: An unchanged credential allows anyone to virtually control door locks and elevators at dozens of apartment buildings across North America, a security researcher found.
articles.content: A security researcher says the default password shipped in a widely used door access control system allows anyone to easily and remotely access door locks and elevator controls in dozens of buildings… [+3883 chars]
